name: Samanthahain
description: A fruity yet herbal drink developed by Ian Scalzo of Bourbon and Branch in San Francisco.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 stalk of rosemary (leaves removed) plus 1 sprig, with leaves, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Make Ginger Syrup: In a saucepan, combine water, ginger juice, and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium high heat. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Let cool.
Make Cocktail: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add applejack, lemon juice, ginger syrup, Benedictine, and rosemary stalk. Shake 30 seconds.
Strain into a Champagne flute. Top with sparkling wine. Garnish with sprig of rosemary.
